events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in full-stack development and cloud technologies.

The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate’s experience and the keywords found in their resume related to software development, devops, and engineering skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process and guide them through the upcoming stages.
The initial screening call was successfully completed, discussing the candidate’s background, motivation, and fundamental engineering skills. They showed good alignment with the role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the interview invitation, confirming their availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 14:00 UTC. The panel will focus on software engineering concepts and practical coding challenges.
